alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:43PM CDT until May 12 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 343 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Abbeville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Shorterville, Murphy Station, Graball, Barnes, Dancey, Hardwickburg, Capps, Hayes, Abbeville Municipal A/P and Willis Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
